text: Jaime Víctor Alguersuari Escudero (born March 23, 1990 in Barcelona), is a Spanish racing driver. He became the youngest Formula One driver in history at the Hungarian Grand Prix. He was 19 years, 4 months, and 3 days old. Alguersuari is the first driver born in the 1990s to compete in Formula One. == Racing record == === Career summary === Season Series Team Races Wins Poles F/Laps Podiums Points Position 2005 Formula Junior 1600 Italia Tomcat Racing 12 2 2 ? 4 160 3rd 2005 Eurocup Formula Renault 2.0 season Epsilon Euskadi 2 0 0 0 0 0 NC 2006 Formula Renault 2.0 Italia Cram Competition 15 0 0 0 1 56 10th 2006 Eurocup Formula Renault 2.0 Cram Competition 14 0 0 0 1 24 12th 2006 Formula Renault 2.0 Italia Winter Series Cram Competition 4 4 4 3 4 142 1st 2007 Formula Renault 2.0 Italia Epsilon Red Bull Team 14 3 3 2 7 266 2nd 2007 Eurocup Formula Renault 2.0 Epsilon Red Bull Team 14 0 0 0 2 67 5th 2008 British F3 Championship Carlin Motorsport 22 5 6 5 12 251 1st 2008 Masters of Formula 3 Carlin Motorsport 1 0 0 0 0 N/A 8th 2008 Macau Grand Prix Carlin Motorsport 1 0 0 0 0 N/A 10th 2008 Spanish F3 Championship GTA Motor Competición 8 3 2 1 4 60 7th 2009 Formula Renault 3.5 Series Carlin Motorsport 17 1 1 1 3 88 6th 2009 Formula One Scuderia Toro Rosso 8 0 0 0 0 0 24th 2010 Formula One Scuderia Toro Rosso 19 0 0 0 0 5 19th 2011 Formula One Scuderia Toro Rosso 11 0 0 0 0 10* 14th* Season in progress.
